price: To, a lõkacin da Muka kuranye azãba daga barinsu zuwa a wani ajali wanda suke mãsu iske shi ne, sai gã su sunã warwarẽwa!
arabic: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلرِّجۡزَ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ هُم بَٰلِغُوهُ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā kashafnā ʿanhumu al-rij'za ilā ajalin hum bālighūhu idhā hum yankuthūna
